text: @NikkiHaley Of course @NikkiHaley remains silent on anything Russia or COVID-19 or injustice here in the 🇺🇸. word on the streets is that she is getting paid by Mother Russia.  #comradeNikki is one Russia’s best investment in destroying America.  The FBI should look at her financial records.
